hooks.command: if [[ "$GEMINI_TOOL_FILE_PATH" =~ \.(js|ts)$ ]]; then npx prettier --write "$GEMINI_TOOL_FILE_PATH" 2>/dev/null || true; elif [[ "$GEMINI_TOOL_FILE_PATH" == *.py ]]; then black "$GEMINI_TOOL_FILE_PATH" 2>/dev/null || true; fi

if command -v osascript >/dev/null; then osascript -e 'display notification "$GEMINI_TOOL_NAME completed" with title "Gemini CLI"'; elif command -v notify-send >/dev/null; then notify-send "Gemini CLI" "$GEMINI_TOOL_NAME completed"; fi
if [[ -f package.json ]]; then npm test 2>/dev/null || yarn test 2>/dev/null || true; elif [[ -f pytest.ini ]]; then pytest 2>/dev/null || true; fi
if [[ -f package.json ]] && grep -q '"build"' package.json; then npm run build 2>/dev/null || true; elif [[ -f Makefile ]]; then make 2>/dev/null || true; fi

if command -v gitleaks >/dev/null; then gitleaks detect --source="$GEMINI_TOOL_FILE_PATH" --no-git 2>/dev/null || true; fi; grep -qE '(password|secret|key)\s*=' "$GEMINI_TOOL_FILE_PATH" && echo "⚠️ Potential secrets in $GEMINI_TOOL_FILE_PATH" || true
for p in '/etc/*' '/usr/bin/*' '*.production.*' '*prod*config*' '/node_modules/*'; do [[ "$GEMINI_TOOL_FILE_PATH" == $p ]] && echo "Error: Protected file" >&2 && exit 1; done
